description: This file defines a Flutter dashboard screen widget, displaying upcoming consultations and recent records for healthcare users, with data fetched from state providers and responsive layout.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Main widget displaying user dashboard with upcoming consultations and recent records.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class managing data fetching and layout for DashboardScreen.

classes.name: _ConsultationsList
classes.description: Stateless widget rendering the list of upcoming consultations.

classes.name: _RecordsList
classes.description: Stateless widget rendering the list of recent records.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes state, triggers data fetch after first frame.

methods.name: _safeFetchProfile
methods.description: Fetches user profile safely, handling asynchronous call.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, responsive layout with consultation and record lists.
